other_tests.findings: Elevated urinary cortisol to cortisone metabolites ratio of 28 (normal, 0.66–2.44). Cortisol secretion rate of 0.43 mg/d (normal, 5–25 mg/d).
Suppressed aldosterone with otherwise normal steroid response.

other_tests.procedure_name: Site-directed mutagenesis / In vitro expression studies
other_tests.findings: Mutation resulted in no enzymatic activity, confirming defect in enzyme 11/H9252HSD2.
Developed mild to moderate hypertensive retinopathy.
